instrument_json_source_root.description: Directory to search for instrument.json (the most recently modified match is selected).
instrument_json_source_root.title: Instrument Json Source Root

instrument_json_source_path.description: Optional explicit path to an instrument.json file (skips auto-search).
instrument_json_source_path.title: Instrument Json Source Path

instrument_json_filename.description: Filename to search for under instrument_json_source_root.
instrument_json_filename.title: Instrument Json Filename

instrument_json_destination_name.description: Destination filename to write into the session root.
instrument_json_destination_name.title: Instrument Json Destination Name

instrument_json_required.description: If true, fail pre-acquisition when an instrument.json cannot be selected/copied.
instrument_json_required.title: Instrument Json Required
